com.skobbler.ngx.search
Class SKNearbySearchSettings

java.lang.Object
  com.skobbler.ngx.search.SKNearbySearchSettings

public class SKNearbySearchSettings
extends java.lang.Object

Stores input parameters for a nearby search.

Version:
2.3

Return the search radius in meters.

setRadius

public void setRadius(int radius)

Parameters:

public void setSearchTerm(java.lang.String searchTerm)

getSearchMode

public SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode getSearchMode()
Return the search mode for the search.

Returns:
search mode. Possible values are SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode.ONLINE or SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode.OFFLINE . Default value is online.

setSearchMode

public void setSearchMode(SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode searchMode)
Set the search mode for the search.

Parameters:
searchMode - new search mode.Possible values are SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode.ONLINE or SKSearchManager.SKSearchMode.OFFLINE . Default value is online.

getSearchType

public int getSearchType()
Return the type of search.

Returns:
type of search. Possible values are : SK_SEARCH_TYPE_POIS , SK_SEARCH_TYPE_STREETS, SK_SEARCH_TYPE_POIS_STREETS. Default values is SK_SEARCH_TYPE_POIS

setSearchType

public void setSearchType(int searchType)
Set the type of search.

Parameters:
searchType - type of search (only pois, only streets,pois and streets). See SK_SEARCH_TYPE_POIS , SK_SEARCH_TYPE_STREETS , SK_SEARCH_TYPE_POIS_STREETS .Default value is SK_SEARCH_TYPE_POIS.

getSearchResultSortType

public int getSearchResultSortType()
Return the type of sort.

Returns:
type of sort. Default value is SK_SEARCH_PROXIMITY_SORT

setSearchResultSortType

public void setSearchResultSortType(int searchResultSortType)
Set the type of sort.

Parameters:
searchResultSortType - type of sort. Default value is SK_SEARCH_PROXIMITY_SORT. Possible values are: SK_SEARCH_PROXIMITY_SORT and SK_SEARCH_MATCH_SORT .Default value is SK_SEARCH_PROXIMITY_SORT

getSearchResultsNumber

public int getSearchResultsNumber()
Return maximum number of search results.

Returns:
maximum number of search results. Default values is 20.

setSearchResultsNumber

public void setSearchResultsNumber(int searchResultsNumber)
Set maximum number of search results.

Parameters:
searchResultsNumber - maximum number of search results. Default value is 20.
